T02D1239:126b-1: sha dam ga s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1239:126b-3: yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1239:126b-4: kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1239:126b-5: dkyil 'khor sgyu ma la bzhugs chu zla dang mtshungs lha mo brgyad kyi bdag /
T02D1239:126b-6: kye'i rdo rje rnam thar bsdu dngos de bzhin nyid kyi zhal dang zhabs phyag sprul //
T02D1239:126b-7: bdud kyi snying ga nyams dga' ba yi gnas su sems can don mdzad dgyes //
T02D1239:126b-8: gar mkhan nam mkha' lta bus dregs par mdzad cing 'gro ba bsrung ba dang //
T02D1239:126b-9: dang po sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku 'dra ba //
T02D1239:126b-10: skye ba'i chu bo sgrol ba'i theg gcig pa //
T02D1239:126b-11: bla ma la gus phyag 'tshal rtog pa yin //
T02D1239:126b-12: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud chen rgya mtsho lta bu las //
T02D1239:126b-13: dom bi'i zhal snga nas kyi rim rnyed pas //
T02D1239:126b-14: kye rdo rje'i shr'i'i sgrub thabs ni //
T02D1239:126b-15: mi shes sgrib g-yogs mun 'dra ba'i //
T02D1239:126b-16: thur ma 'di ni brtsam par bya //
T02D1239:126b-17: dngos grub kyi ni sems 'di yis //
T02D1239:126b-18: mtshan mo'i dus su rang khyim dang //
T02D1239:126b-19: dur khrod chu 'gram de dag tu //
T02D1239:126b-20: 'jigs pa med par bsam gtan bya //
T02D1239:126b-21: snying gar chu skyes nyi ma de'o //
T02D1239:126b-22: gzugs brnyan h'u% las khyad par bsgom //
T02D1239:126b-23: bla ma rdo rje mchod nas ni //
T02D1239:126b-24: bdun po yongs su dag par ni //
T02D1239:126b-25: goo r'i la sogs lha mo brgyad //
T02D1239:126b-26: mchod pa yongs su spro bar bya //
T02D1239:126b-27: sdig pa byas pa bshags pa dang //
T02D1239:126b-28: byed pa yang ni sdom pa dang //
T02D1239:126b-29: bsod nams rjes su yi rang dang //
T02D1239:126b-30: de dag yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D1239:126b-31: dkon mchog skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02D1239:126b-32: byang chub mchog sems bskyed pa dang //
T02D1239:126b-33: lam la gnas shing bdag kyang ni //
T02D1239:126b-34: gzhan gyi don du dbul ba dang //
T02D1239:126b-35: gnang ba nod dang tshangs pa yi //
T02D1239:126b-36: gnas ni bzhi po'i bsam gtan bya //
T02D1239:126b-37: dang po byams pa bsgom bya zhing //
T02D1239:126b-38: gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom //
T02D1239:126b-39: gsum pa dga' ba bsgom pa ste //
T02D1239:127a-2: yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ni //
T02D1239:127a-3: bsgom zhing 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02D1239:127a-4: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1239:127a-5: stong pad ram skyes h'u% dngos la //
T02D1239:127a-6: sna tshogs rdo rje'i bsam gtan bya //
T02D1239:127a-7: 'gro ba'i bdud rnams sel byed pa'i //
T02D1239:127a-8: h'u% las gsal bar spro bar bya //
T02D1239:127a-9: aom raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1239:127a-11: 'di las rdo rje bskor ba'i gur //
T02D1239:127a-12: bla re yang ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1239:127a-13: rdo rje'i sa la nam mkha'i dbyings //
T02D1239:127a-14: yam ram bam lam byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1239:127a-15: bhr'um las 'khor lo'i steng du bdag / bar ma'i skyes pa'i bsam gtan bya //
T02D1239:127a-18: gcig 'gyur de las sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D1239:127a-19: gzhal yas khang du gyur pa ste //
T02D1239:127a-20: ngos bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1239:127a-21: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1239:127a-22: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
T02D1239:127a-23: ka ba brgyad kyis shin tu spras //
T02D1239:127a-24: lha mo brgyad kyi 'od rnams ni //
T02D1239:127a-25: gsal ba yis ni snam bu yin //
T02D1239:127a-27: brgyad pa bri zhing phreng ba gcig / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02D1239:127a-28: bdud bzhi yis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1239:127a-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa l'a n'i ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ho //
T02D1239:127a-30: sangs rgyas pho brang bye brag rdzogs //
T02D1239:127a-31: rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa ni //
T02D1239:127a-32: zla ba me long ye shes te //
T02D1239:127a-33: rta bdun pa ni mnyam pa nyid //
T02D1239:127a-34: lha yi sa bon phyag mtshan ni //
T02D1239:127a-35: so sor rtog pa yin zhes zer //
T02D1239:127a-36: thams cad gcig 'gyur bya nan tan //
T02D1239:127a-37: gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa de chos dbyings //
T02D1239:127a-38: a'a li bsgom pa zla ba ste //
T02D1239:127a-39: k'a li rta bdun pa yin no //
T02D1239:127a-40: gnyis kyi bar na aom dang h'um //
T02D1239:127a-41: de gnyis rdo rje gri gug gyur //
T02D1239:127a-42: zla nyi sa bon phyag mtshan ni //
T02D1239:127a-43: 'di dag thams cad gcig gyur pa //
T02D1239:127a-44: chu dang 'o ma tha dad med //
T02D1239:127a-45: de 'dra'i rdo rje bsam gtan ni //
T02D1239:127a-46: zhal brgyad phyag ni bcu drug pa //
T02D1239:127a-48: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1239:127a-49: bdag med ma yis phrag nas 'khyud //
T02D1239:127a-50: phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02D1239:127a-51: zla ba'i nor bu kha dog 'od //
T02D1239:127a-52: rtsa ba'i lus mdog g-yon gyi ni //
T02D1239:127a-53: zhal ni dmar dang dkar dang gzhan //
T02D1239:127a-54: glang po rta bong glang rnga mo //
T02D1239:127a-55: mi dang seng ge de byi la //
T02D1239:127b-0: g-yas @127b pa'i thod pa brgyad pa ni //
T02D1239:127b-1: dang po glang po rim shes bya //
T02D1239:127b-2: gzhi dang chu gnas rlung dang ni //
T02D1239:127b-3: me lha de nas snang byed dang /
T02D1239:127b-4: phyi mthar byed dang nor sbyin ni //
T02D1239:127b-5: g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o //
T02D1239:127b-6: lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1239:127b-7: gnag cing gyen du bsgreng ba ser //
T02D1239:127b-8: gri gug thod pa kha tv'am ga /'dzin cing stag lpags sham thabs can //
T02D1239:127b-9: aom padma su kh'a dha ra ma h'a r'a ga su khanda da tsa tur /
T02D1239:127b-10: a'a nanda bha ga bi shva h'u% h'u% h'u%/
T02D1239:127b-12: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tur /
T02D1239:127b-13: a'a nanda d'a ya ka kha ga mu khee ka ra so n'a tha h'u% h'u% h'u%/
T02D1239:127b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1239:127b-16: dang por skyes bu bsam de nas //
T02D1239:127b-18: rdo rje rjes su chags byed pas //
T02D1239:127b-19: rgyal ba'i khu ba rjes su 'gyur //
T02D1239:127b-20: sa bon brgyad du gyur pa'o //
T02D1239:127b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le de //
T02D1239:127b-22: gam tsam bam gham bam sam lam dam //
T02D1239:127b-23: lha mo'i sa bon dbyung ba'o //
T02D1239:127b-24: goo r'i dbang gshin chom rkun ma //
T02D1239:127b-25: ro langs ma ni chu bdag gnas //
T02D1239:127b-26: ghasma r'i ni gsus po che //
T02D1239:127b-27: de bzhin pukka s'i dbang ldan //
T02D1239:127b-28: ri khrod ma ni byin za'i grva //
T02D1239:127b-29: gtum mo bden bral la gnas te //
T02D1239:127b-30: g-yung mo 'di ni rlung gnas na //
T02D1239:127b-32: ho gnyis dbus su gnas pa ni //
T02D1239:127b-33: sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ste //
T02D1239:127b-34: 'di ni bar ma'i sems can ming //
T02D1239:127b-35: lha mo'i padmar bsam gtan bya //
T02D1239:127b-36: bar ma mnyam par 'jug pa ni //
T02D1239:127b-37: khu ba'i ngo bos rjes su dran //
T02D1239:127b-38: mtshams kyi lha mos bskul ba ste //
T02D1239:127b-39: de nas dbyangs kyis bskul bar bya //
T02D1239:127b-40: snying rje'i yid kyis bla med bzhengs //
T02D1239:127b-41: pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1239:127b-42: stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni //
T02D1239:127b-43: bdag la 'dod pa'i bde chen sbyor //
T02D1239:127b-44: khyed mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1239:127b-45: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spangs la //
T02D1239:127b-46: ri khrod ma 'bras grub par ni //
T02D1239:127b-47: kye yi rdo rje khyed bzhengs shig /'jig rten phyir smon 'dod pa'i gtso //
T02D1239:127b-48: ci phyir stong pa'i ngang las bzhugs //
T02D1239:127b-49: khyod mi bzhugs na phyogs mi khums //
T02D1239:127b-50: gtum mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1239:127b-51: g-yung mo bdag ni yid rmongs pas //
T02D1239:127b-52: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad par //
T02D1239:127b-53: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1239:127b-54: khyod ni mig 'phrul lta bur bzhengs //
T02D1239:128a-1: bas sngon gyi byang chub kyi //
T02D1239:128a-2: smon lam rjes su dran pa'o //
T02D1239:128a-3: khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs pa ni //
T02D1239:128a-4: aom dang h'u% gnyis rdo rje che //
T02D1239:128a-5: zhal brgyad zhabs ni bzhi pa ste //
T02D1239:128a-6: phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan //
T02D1239:128a-7: bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste //
T02D1239:128a-8: phyed bcas pa yis gar mkhan ni //
T02D1239:128a-9: mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas //
T02D1239:128a-10: sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin //
T02D1239:128a-11: rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che //
T02D1239:128a-12: g-yas pa ku mu da dang mtshungs //
T02D1239:128a-13: g-yon pa dmar po chen po 'jigs //
T02D1239:128a-14: phyi ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs //
T02D1239:128a-15: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyug / bdag med ma la bde ba ster //
T02D1239:128a-16: glang po rta bong glang rnga mong //
T02D1239:128a-17: mi dang seng ge de byi la //
T02D1239:128a-18: g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po ni //
T02D1239:128a-19: dang po glang po rim shes bya //
T02D1239:128a-20: gzhi dang chu gnas rlung dang ni //
T02D1239:128a-21: me zla de nas snang byed dang //
T02D1239:128a-22: phyi mthar byed dang nor sbyin ni //
T02D1239:128a-23: g-yon ba'i thod pa brgyad na'o //
T02D1239:128a-24: goo r'i kha dog nag mo'o //
T02D1239:128a-25: chom rkun ma ni btsod dang mtshungs //
T02D1239:128a-26: ro langs ma ni gser bsregs mdog / ghasma r'i ni margat mtshungs //
T02D1239:128a-27: pukka s'i ni dbang sngon mo //
T02D1239:128a-28: ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od //
T02D1239:128a-29: gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo bsangs ma //
T02D1239:128a-30: g-yung mo sna tshogs pa ru 'dod //
T02D1239:128a-31: goo r'i g-yas na gri gug ste //
T02D1239:128a-32: g-yon na nya ni de bzhin no ;
T02D1239:128a-33: / chom rkun ma g-yas cang te'u ste //
T02D1239:128a-34: g-yon na phag pa de bzhin no //
T02D1239:128a-35: ro langs ma g-yas rus sbal te //
T02D1239:128a-36: g-yon pa'i lag pa thod pa'o //
T02D1239:128a-37: za phod ma yi g-yas na sbrul //
T02D1239:128a-38: g-yon pa'i lag pa thod pa'o //
T02D1239:128a-39: pukka s'i g-yas seng ge ste //
T02D1239:128a-40: g-yon pa'i phyag na dgra sta 'dzin //
T02D1239:128a-41: ri khrod ma g-yas dge slong ste //
T02D1239:128a-42: g-yon pa na ni gsil byed shes //
T02D1239:128a-43: gtum mo g-yas na 'khor lo ste //
T02D1239:128a-44: g-yon na thod pa de bzhin no //
T02D1239:128a-45: g-yung mo g-yas na rdo rje ste //
T02D1239:128a-46: g-yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no //
T02D1239:128a-47: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas //
T02D1239:128a-48: goo r'i la sogs phyag gnyis shes ;
T02D1239:128a-49: / spyan gsum skra ni gyen du yin //
T02D1239:128a-50: phyag rgya lnga yis shin tu mdzes //
T02D1239:128a-51: tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag / gshin rje nor gyi bdag po dang //
T02D1239:128a-52: bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D1239:128a-53: goo r'i la sogs pa yi gdan //
T02D1239:128a-54: thams cad rdo rje 'di yis ni //
T02D1239:128b-0: rang sngags yi ge @128b rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1239:128b-1: phyag rgya phyag mtshan gyur pa las //
T02D1239:128b-2: snying gar ye shes bsam gtan bya //
T02D1239:128b-3: rang snying pad nyir h'u% rdo rje //
T02D1239:128b-4: h'u% ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i snying //
T02D1239:128b-5: pad nyir gnas pa'i h'u% rdo rje //
T02D1239:128b-6: h'u% ye shes rjes su bsam pa'o //
T02D1239:128b-7: dam tshig 'khor lo la mnyam thim //
T02D1239:128b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni //
T02D1239:128b-10: bsgrubs te gzhan yang du ma yin //
T02D1239:128b-12: goo r'i la sogs bzhi po 'dis //
T02D1239:128b-13: dgug dang 'di ni gzhug pa dang //
T02D1239:128b-14: bcing dang rjes su dgyes par bya //
T02D1239:128b-15: mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs //
T02D1239:128b-16: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bsam //
T02D1239:128b-17: mig gnyis rdo rje gti mug ma //
T02D1239:128b-18: rna gnyis zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1239:128b-19: sna ni ser sna ma zhes brjod //
T02D1239:128b-20: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1239:128b-21: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1239:128b-22: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1239:128b-23: ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed ;
T02D1239:128b-24: / phyag gnyis zhal gcig bzang po yi //
T02D1239:128b-25: gri gug thod pa lag na bcas //
T02D1239:128b-26: sna tshogs mdog can ro yi gdan //
T02D1239:128b-27: sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su ni //
T02D1239:128b-29: 'di las mkha' spyod sa spyod ma //
T02D1239:128b-30: zhabs 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya //
T02D1239:128b-31: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02D1239:128b-32: rnal 'byor ma ni rigs gsum dngos //
T02D1239:128b-33: rang snying sa bon khyad par spro //
T02D1239:128b-34: lcags kyu'i gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02D1239:128b-35: sangs rgyas spyan drangs yang dag mchod //
T02D1239:128b-36: dbang bskur ba ni blang ba'o //
T02D1239:128b-37: mgon po de bzhin gshegs thams cad //
T02D1239:128b-38: khyed kyis bdag la dbang bskur cig / de nas
T02D1239:128b-39: de bzhin gshegs 'di dag / he ru ka gzugs
T02D1239:128b-40: byas nas ni // bdud rtsi lnga yi chus gang ba'i //
T02D1239:128b-41: bum pa nyid kyi phyag gis bsnams //
T02D1239:128b-42: blugs te dbang bskur mtha' ru 'di'i //
T02D1239:128b-43: rtsa ba'i mi bskyod phyag rgya'o //
T02D1239:128b-44: de ni yang ni goo r'i dang //
T02D1239:128b-46: sangs rgyas rin chen dpag med yang //
T02D1239:128b-47: phyi ma drug la gnyis gnyis rim //
T02D1239:128b-48: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1239:129a-0: sa bon lngar gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i ro myong bar byed @129a * //
T02D1239:129a-2: / rdo rje nas kyi 'bru tsam bsams te /
T02D1239:129a-3: dpal kye rdo rje brtag pa'o //
T02D1239:129a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta sva da na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1239:129a-5: ye shes mchod pa sna tshogs sogs //
T02D1239:129a-6: lha mo 'di brgyad mchod pa ni //
T02D1239:129a-7: spro zhing 'khor lo'i bdag po ni //
T02D1239:129a-8: 'khor lo'i bdag nyid pas sngon mchod //
T02D1239:129a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1239:129a-10: rnal 'byor ma ni de dag gis //
T02D1239:129a-11: 'khor lo'i gtso bo la bstod pa //
T02D1239:129a-12: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor //
T02D1239:129a-13: nyid kyi thugs kyis khyod dgongs grub //
T02D1239:129a-14: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'khor ba kun sgrub pa ;
T02D1239:129a-15: / snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can byang chub tu //
T02D1239:129a-16: kun rdzob sgyu mas byang chub sgrub pa'i yid //
T02D1239:129a-17: dgyes pa'i shr'i he ru ka rdo rje bstod //
T02D1239:129a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1239:129a-19: rdo rje rjes su chags byed dang //
T02D1239:129a-20: sangs rgyas gzhal med bye brag bsgom //
T02D1239:129a-21: dbang bskur bdud rtsi myang ba dang //
T02D1239:129a-22: mchod pa bstod pa yan lag drug / yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor gang //
T02D1239:129a-23: de ni myur du dngos grub thob //
T02D1239:129a-24: pho brang sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1239:129a-25: dbang ni mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1239:129a-26: bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med //
T02D1239:129a-27: bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan dpal //
T02D1239:129a-28: mchod pa don yod yang dag mchod //
T02D1239:129a-29: rjes chags rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1239:129a-30: dngos grub 'di ni nye ba yi //
T02D1239:129a-31: yan lag drug gis bskyed pa ni //
T02D1239:129a-32: dang po sprin dang 'dra ba mthong //
T02D1239:129a-33: gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba ste //
T02D1239:129a-34: gsum pa glog gi rnam pa'o //
T02D1239:129a-35: bzhi pa mar me 'bar ba dang //
T02D1239:129a-36: lnga pa thams cad snang ba ste //
T02D1239:129a-38: phyis ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtshungs //
T02D1239:129a-39: rmi lam snang ba skad cig go //
T02D1239:129a-40: lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis //
T02D1239:129a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02D1239:129a-42: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pa //
T02D1239:129a-43: bsregs pas ham las ri bong 'byung //
T02D1239:129a-44: bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor gang //
T02D1239:129a-45: don ni dag pa rjes su dran //
T02D1239:129a-46: snying rje spyan ni dmar po ste //
T02D1239:129a-47: yan lag nag po byams pa'i thugs //
T02D1239:129a-48: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa ni //
T02D1239:129a-49: zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod //
T02D1239:129a-50: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa yin //
T02D1239:129b-0: bcu drug phyag @129b ni stong pa ste //
T02D1239:129b-1: phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas yin //
T02D1239:129b-2: khro bo gdug pa 'dul ba po //
T02D1239:129b-3: spyan gsum po ni sku gsum mo //
T02D1239:129b-4: rus pa bden pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1239:129b-5: gzugs ni rdo rje ma yin te //
T02D1239:129b-6: tshor ba gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
T02D1239:129b-7: de bzhin chu ma 'du shes phung //
T02D1239:129b-9: rnam shes 'di ni bdag med ma //
T02D1239:129b-10: don dam la ni phung po med //
T02D1239:129b-11: de ni yan lag drug tu 'gyur //
T02D1239:129b-12: skye mched drug ni dag pa yi //
T02D1239:129b-13: zhe sdang rdo rje rdo rje ma //
T02D1239:129b-14: rdo rje ro ma 'bab ri yin //
T02D1239:129b-15: phrag dog rdo rje ma de bzhin //
T02D1239:129b-16: gti mug rdo rje ma yang ni //
T02D1239:129b-17: yin te rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1239:129b-18: ser sna gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
T02D1239:129b-19: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1239:129b-20: sa ni pukka s'i ru brjod //
T02D1239:129b-21: chu rnams ri khrod ma zhes zer //
T02D1239:129b-22: drod ni gtum mor shes par bya //
T02D1239:129b-23: rlung ni g-yung mor rab tu brjod //
T02D1239:129b-24: gzugs ni goo r'ir yang dag bshad //
T02D1239:129b-25: sgra ni chom rkun ma ru bshad //
T02D1239:129b-26: so so'i dri ni langs ma //
T02D1239:129b-27: ro yi tshul ni za phod ma //
T02D1239:129b-28: reg bya sa spyod ma zhes brjod //
T02D1239:129b-29: chos kyi khams ni mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1239:129b-30: sa ni dang por nor sbyin mtha' //
T02D1239:129b-31: phyug po thams cad sa 'grub bo //
T02D1239:129b-32: glang po la sogs 'dzin pa ni //
T02D1239:129b-33: nad ni nye bar zhi ba'o //
T02D1239:129b-34: glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin smyo //
T02D1239:129b-35: khrag skyugs mdze nad birdzi ka / mcher pa mchin pa rang gzugs ni //
T02D1239:129b-36: glang po la sogs rab tu brjod //
T02D1239:129b-37: ni ram su 'am gzhan las ni //
T02D1239:129b-38: bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D1239:129b-39: aom aasht'a na n'a ya bim gordha ke sha wartma ne /
T02D1239:129b-42: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02D1239:129b-43: krishna dz'i m'u ta wa pu she /
T02D1239:129b-44: ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'a dh'a ri ne /
T02D1239:129b-45: a'atm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya aardhendu damshtri ne /
T02D1239:129b-46: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D1239:129b-47: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02D1239:129b-50: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D1239:129b-55: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha:phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1239:129b-56: bar chad thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir //
T02D1239:129b-57: gtor ma rgyun du sbyin par bya //
T02D1239:129b-58: aom aindam dza ma dza la dzakkha bh'u ta bahni
T02D1239:129b-59: b'a au r'akkha tsanda sudzdza ma da bappa ta la
T02D1239:129b-60: p'a t'a le aashta sappa sv'a h'a /
T02D1239:129b-61: ai dam ba lim bhum dza dzim gha phulla dh'uppa m'am sa pim ga aambha sappa kadzdza s'a da /
T02D1239:129b-64: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am /
T02D1239:129b-65: a'adya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a:h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1239:129b-66: lha mo'i rgyud kyi padma mang po ni //
T02D1239:130a-0: @130a * // bla ma zhi bas nyi ma'i 'od kyis phye //
T02D1239:130a-1: mi thub zla bas sbrang rtsi gzhibs 'thungs bas //
T02D1239:130a-2: sgrub pa'i thabs ni sbrang rtsi skyugs pa'o //
T02D1239:130a-3: dpal gyi thugs rje'i stobs kyis sgrub thabs byas //
T02D1239:130a-4: 'di las ngal bar gyur pa'i bsod nams gang //
T02D1239:130a-5: des thob skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i //
T02D1239:130a-6: theg pa 'gro ba sgrol ba'i rgyur gyur cig / yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba //
T02D1239:130a-7: slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1239:130a-9: // / bla ma dam pas bka' stsal pa //
T02D1239:130a-10: dge slong sh'akya ye shes kyis //
T02D1239:130a-11: yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D1239:130a-12: sh'akya dkon mchog bdag med la //
T02D1239:130a-13: rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad phyir //
T02D1239:130a-14: nus pas bsgyur ba gang yod pa //
T02D1239:130a-15: kye yi rdo rje myur thob shog / rgya gar
T02D1239:130a-16: gyi mkhan po ratna shr'i dzny'a na ri zhal snga
